name: RobotLAB
description: RobotsLAB is on a mission to change the way abstract math and science is being taught. We bring abstract math and science concepts to life, using robots, making teachers super-heros, engaging students and ensuring their career and college readiness.
one_liner: RobotsLAB is on a mission to change the way abstract math and science is being taught. We bring abstract math and science concepts to life, using robots, making teachers super-heros, engaging students and ensuring their career and college readiness.
